reviewTitle: From Frustration to Satisfaction: A Bluetooth Speaker Worth the Second Chance
reviewDescription:
The media could not be loaded.
                
            
                
            
            
        
    
    








  
  
     I recently purchased a Bluetooth speaker from boAt, and my initial experience left me disheartened due to persistent crackling sounds. However, I'm pleased to say that the replacement unit completely turned things around, and I'm now thoroughly satisfied with my purchase.My initial excitement for this speaker was quickly dampened when I encountered the crackling sound issue. It was a considerable annoyance as it marred what should have been a superb audio experience. I tried adjusting settings, rebooting devices, and even consulting customer support, but the issue remained unresolved.Thankfully, the customer support team was responsive and understanding. They promptly arranged for a replacement unit to be sent to me. I was somewhat skeptical but hopeful that the replacement would provide the quality sound experience I had initially hoped for.To my delight, the replacement speaker exceeded my expectations. It's safe to say that the crackling issue was isolated to the first unit, and this new speaker delivered pristine sound quality. The audio was clear, crisp, and everything I had envisioned when I first made the purchase.Aside from the improved sound quality, I also appreciated the speaker's sleek design, ease of use, and long battery life. It effortlessly paired with my devices, and I haven't experienced any connectivity issues since receiving the replacement.The boAt Bluetooth speaker has now become a reliable companion for my music needs. It's perfect for gatherings, outdoor adventures, or even a relaxing evening at home. I'm genuinely impressed with the product's performance, and it's clear that the initial crackling issue was an unfortunate anomaly.In summary, my journey with the boAt Bluetooth speaker started on a sour note but ultimately ended on a high one. I'm thrilled with the quality and performance of the replacement unit, and it has renewed my faith in this brand's products. While the initial hiccup was frustrating, the company's commitment to customer satisfaction and the exceptional performance of the replacement speaker have made this purchase well worth it. I'm now happily enjoying my music without any crackling interruptions.
The product is so good...sound quality is super good...super handdy...so Happy

reviewTitle: This just sounds terrible! Go for other brands.
reviewDescription: They sell this one with bass as a USP, whereas bass is exactly what this piece lacks. I compared this with few other speakers, and it just sounds really bad. Considering I paid 1699 for it, it's really not worth the price. And guess what? Amazon has a No return policy on this, so u can NOT have it replaced with another product or return it to get a refund. So now I'm stuck with a product that I hate. I can only get it replaced with the same product (lol) in case it's defective. I think Amazon is doing this for a lot of electronic items off late, which I honestly feel will discourage people from buying electronic items from Amazon, and instead compel them to go to their nearby electronic shops that offer more flexibility and option to test these items before buying.I'd rather go for slightly more expensive but more reliable brands, that offer more flexibility in terms of exchange, return or refund.Boat speakers are usually cheaper compared to other brands, but know this that the lower price comes with its own drawbacks. I strongly feel their parts are of inferior quality, because twice it has happened with my older Boat speakers that they stopped working one fine day, no mishandling, no falling, no liquid spills, just stopped working standing at its place. That too just a year after purchase when warranty was over. Their service centers are very few even in big cities, so it's usually not worth travelling distances to get these repaired since you bought it cheap in the first place. I don't know what made me buy this piece of junk.Anyway, would suggest people to be aware of this. Personally , I would be staying as far away from Boat as a brand as possible.

reviewTitle: If you prefer BLUETOOTH over AUX, then go for it. Let me explain:
reviewDescription:
The media could not be loaded.
                
            
                
            
            
        
    
    








  
  
     If you see the video, you'll see that the audio separation in AUX is pretty bad. It's almost like MONO through AUX. If you want to get STEREO output, play music from USB or BLUETOOTH. The clarity is good and this gets pretty loud and almost unbearable to sit infront of the speaker when in full volume. Your mother is gonna yell at you, "TURN IT OFF ARE YOU DEAF OR SOMETHING? CANT YOU LISTEN TO MUSIC IN NORMAL VOLUME LIKE EVERYONE ELSE" that kind of loud it gets when you are near. Other than that the clarity is pretty good in 50-60% volume. But if you wish to use this with your smart TV via AUX, I would suggest not to. I got the product replaced thinking it was an issue with my unit, but same observed from replacement unit as well. So I knew for cost cutting they've cut some corners. Another issue is while playing music, mostly via pendrive, the first 0.5-1second of music is cut. For example if you play " suno ikhthi kanchki duniya from Bachna ae haseeno, you'll hear "uno ikhthi kanchki duniya". Battery life is decent, if you go full volume for 2-3 hours it'll easily depleat the battery. Another good thing about this is we can use this speaker plugged to AC power via TYPE C. In conclusion, if you buy for TV, NOT A GOOD CHOICE, But if you have songs in your pendrive or wishing to play via Bluetooth, it's fine. Cutting 1 star for this AUX issue and another 2 stars for unbearable AMAZON DELIVERY SERVICE IN PUNE. they'll deliver the item at their on comfort. They won't even make a call and mark it was "delivery attempted but customer not reachable" and calls after 5 mins thinking they are calling another customer and confirm the address.
